Uses of Interface
il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1.UrlCheck

  • Uses of UrlCheck in il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1

    Classes in il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1 that implement UrlCheck
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  UrlCheckI
    Checks a URL for the presence of img tags.
    class  UrlCheckL
    Checks if a URL is in the requested language.
    class  UrlCheckT
    Check if a URL's content type header starts with a given string.
    class  UrlCheckW
    Given a path to a file with words in it (separated by spaces and new lines) this class's instance will check if the given URL contains all of the words in the file.
    Fields in il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1 with type parameters of type UrlCheck
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,​UrlCheck> UrlCheckFactory.instances
    This map stores the UrlCheck implementation instances after they are generated for future use.
    Methods in il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1 that return UrlCheck
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    UrlCheck UrlCheckFactory.GenerateUrlCheck.execute()
    Calling this should result in generation of a new UrlCheck implementation instance.
    static UrlCheck UrlCheckFactory.getCheckFor​(char opCode)
    Returns the registered UrlCheck implementation for the given op-code.
